Windows Phone 8.1

Saving Windows Phone

August 31, 2014

It’s no secret that I’ve been loving Windows Phone and using it as my daily driver. The OS just feels right to me. The apps that I use work better on Windows Phone than Android and IOS. While there are a handful of news sources that are pro Windows Phone. There’s one place I’ve been visiting lately  where I’m having great conversations and and I love the real world view they have regarding Windows Phone. That’s Lifestylesdefined. I was mentioned about 4 minutes in on the video below. If you haven’t visited their Youtube Channel and you love Windows stuff they’re definitely worth checking out.

Microsoft the 90% Company
Switching Back To Appleland
